transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Ha Himanshu.
Executive: Ha, hi sir. Himanshu bol raha hu IndiaMART se sir. Good afternoon sir. 
Customer: Ha ha. Ha are mai kya bol raha tha ki wo jo certificate jo hai na apna wo certificate mera thoda issue karwa dena. Mere ko usko zara frame vagera karwana tha.
Executive: Accha TS catalog wala?
Customer: Ha ha ha. Mere ko khali certificate issue kara do baki to baad me abhi December ke time pe renewal karoge to bhi chalega. Kyuki payment to kar diya na payment us din ho gayi thi.
Executive: Ha nahi wo to ho gaya sir aur service bhi aisa nahi hai service bhi live kara hi denge. Wo wo to bilkul thik baat hai sir baki mai aapka TS catalog ke liye baat kar leta hu ek bar. Accha sir ek cheez mai ye keh raha tha service na service na bahut dino se disengage rahi hai. To thoda sa sir activity karane ki zarurat thi mujhe. To kyuki ye ye chalu karana zaruri hai sir. To thoda sa mujhe aap batao to hum video meet pe 15 minutes ke liye zyada nahi 15 minutes me ye cheez clear ho jayegi.
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Ha thoda sa mujhe activity karana padega sir.
Customer: Thik hai chalega vaise koi dikkat nahi hai. To mai aapko share karu video meet ka link abhi?
Executive: Ah abhi mai share karu khali thoda 15-20 minutes do uske baad kar lo koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Accha 15 abhi 15-20 minute ke baad kare?
Customer: Ha. Par mai kya bol raha hu certificate mera kab tak issue karwa doge?
Executive: Sir mai thoda ek bar pata kar lu fir mai aapko exact bata dunga thik hai sir.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai thoda mere ko batao thik hai.
Executive: Ha thik hai thik hai. Mai abhi sir abhi 15-15-20 minute se aapko link share karta hu kindly join kariega sir.
Customer: Thik thik thik.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants the TS catalog certificate issued.

- Wants to re-engage the service.



Resolution:

- Executive assured service will be live.

- Executive agreed to check on TS catalog certificate.

- Executive agreed to share video meet link after 15-20 minutes.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share video meet link after 15-20 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- ts catalog, certificate, video meet, service
